configd:help.text: Multicast Listener Discovery (MLD)
Specify access-list that defines multicast groups that are exempted from being subject to configured limit
Configure the limit on the maximum number of group membership states
Enable SSM mapping on the router
Configure the static mode of defining SSM mapping
Configure access-list for the static mode of defining SSM mapping
Configure access-list for the static mode of defining SSM mapping
Configure IPv6 source address to use for static map group
Multicast Listener Discovery (MLD)
Immediate leave feature
Define multicast groups in which the immediate leave feature is enabled
Configure the robustness variable value on an interface
Configure the timeout period that the router waits after the previous querier has stopped querying before it takes over as the querier
Specify access-list that defines multicast groups that are exempted from being subject to configured limit
Configure the limit on the maximum number of group membership states
Configure the maximum response time advertised in MLD queries
Set the last-member query-count value
Set standard IPv6 Multicast group address to be configured as a static group member
Set standard IPv6 Multicast group address to be configured as a static group member
Configure standard IPv6 source address as a static source from where multicast packets originate
Configure the frequency at which the router sends MLD group-specific host query messages
Configure the current MLD protocol version on an interface
Control the multicast local-membership groups learnt on an interface
Configure the frequency of sending MLD host query messages
